intro: Elatostema baiseense, commonly known as the Baise elatostema, is a small herbaceous plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettles and related species. The plant features heart-shaped leaves with a hairy surface and small, inconspicuous white flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest floors. Its botanical characteristics make it a subject of interest in botanical studies and conservation efforts.
